titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1998, the duty on Fybrel (SWP).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/16/1996--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on fybrel (SWP) in bulk form or packaged for retail sale.
